Objective: Verify navigating to brands page from footer link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps: 1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Brands page

Objective: Verify the brand index option functionality
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click an alphabet in index section
3) Repeat step 2 for all indexes
Expected Result: The Page should scroll to selected index alphabet

Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
3) Repeat step 2 for all indexes
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Brands Product display page

Objective: Verify the breadcrumb of Brands product listing page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
Expected Result: The Breadcrumb should be displayed and working

Objective: Verify the breadcrumb of Brands page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps: 1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
Expected Result: The Breadcrumb should be displayed and working

Objective: Verify sorting the products in Brands Product listing page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
3) Click sort by dropdown and select an option
4) Repeat step 2 for all dropdown options
Expected Result: The products should be sorted according to selected sort option

Objective: Verify arranging the products in list and grid in Brand Prodcut listing page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
3) Click List (ER-01)
4) Click Grid (ER-02)
Expected Result:
1) The products should be arranged in List format
2) The products should be arranged in Grid format

Objective: Verify the show number of listings functionality
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
3) Click the dropdown in Show section and select an option
4) Repeat step 3 for all options
Expected Result: The number of Product listings should be listed properly according to the selected option

Objective: Verify the product compare button functionality
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
3) Click Product compare button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Product compare page

Objective: Verify adding to cart from Brand Product listing page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
3) Click add to cart button in any product
Expected Result: The product should be added to cart and success message should be shown

1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands
3) Click add to Wishlist button in any product

Test Steps:
1) Click the Brands in footer under extras label
2) Click a brand from available brands

Objective: Verify the Brands Page functionality in all the supported environments
